name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

RECENT CHANGES:
v1.0
- Unlock system and better UI for bonus content.
- Added 9 new cards and 2 new relics.
- Tons of minor card rebalancing.
- Added ending cutscene and better lore.
- Many fixes for long-standing minor bugs.
- Hi-res power images and proper relic outlines.

Check the GitHub release page for a full list of changes; there are far too many to list here.


Thanks for playing the Construct! Please let Moocowsgomoo know on Steam, Discord, or GitHub if you have any feedback or bug reports!
